com.schibsted.account

Class AuthClient.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.schibsted.account.AuthClient.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    AuthClient

    public static class AuthClient.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for configuring and creating a new instance of AuthClient.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(ClientCredentials clientCredentials)
      Constructor for creating AuthClient configured to communicate with Schibsted account's production environment.
      Builder(ClientCredentials clientCredentials, AuthClient.Environment environment)
      Constructor specifying which Schibsted account environment to use.
      Builder(ClientCredentials clientCredentials, java.net.URI serverAddress)
      Constructor specifying the URL of the OAuth server.
